QueryDefinition.Query: select e.encid, cast(replace(e.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, cast(replace(e.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, e.interaction_type, e.interaction_date, e.interaction_time, ec.provid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by e.encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role, specialty) sort_index, v.discharge_disposition, v.admission_source, 1 as ordinal from {sc}.encounter as e JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND e.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = e.encid LEFT JOIN {sc}.provider p on p.provid = ec.provid LEFT JOIN {sc}.visit v on e.ptid = v.ptid and e.visitid = v.visitid where v.visitid is null and e.encid is not NULL and e.encid != '' order by cast(replace(e.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
